name: HiveCorp
description:
Become an unstoppable force and survive endless waves of enemies in this unforgiving action rogue-lite auto-shooter.
Unlock new equipment and upgrade your stats to keep pushing the limit of how long you can survive.

Newcomers survival guide:

  • Prioritize weapon cards during the first waves to stay ahead
  • Prioritize picking up experience when planning how to dodge the swarm
  • Do as many quests as possible
  • Don't get hit!

Get harder, better, faster and stronger

Gather valuable resources during your run so that you later can upgrade your permanent stats.
Defeat strong units and find blueprints to unlock new equipment for your equipment card rolls.
Rank up and unlock more options for your loadout such as perks, ultimate abilities and primary weapons.
